title: Better the Devil EU Knows
itunes:title: Better the Devil EU Knows
description:
The European Union knows Liz Truss and 'they don't like what she did', says Mujtaba Rahman, Managing Director for Europe at Eurasia Group. He tells Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll and Yuan Potts that if Rishi Sunak was to become the next Prime Minister, it could be an opportunity to reset relations with Brussels. Also in the show, we hear from Labour peer Peter Hain on the UK government's move to ban Bain & Company from public contracts for three years. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
